title: Has it gotten worse recently
body: People not even choosing bans/ picking, has it gotten worse recently? i feel most of my time playing league of legends is watching queue pop, then waiting for someone to not lock in or even choose a pick/ ban

replies.body:
In my experience, only 2 in 5 players actually pick in ranked. 1 in 15 at least actually yell at me for accidentally banning their pick.

But watchya gonna do about it? If riot punished them, it'd just give them something new to complain about and then they'd turn to trolling no doubt. It's OCE.
but why ban their pick? if they highlight a champion and your team has first pick, why ban what is possibly your teammates most competent champion?

"omg i cant play adc/supp someone swap"

"no"

lobby disbands.
yeah i get that, its also bad like the summoner names ive seen lately too,  "go Fuk yourself" Aus are all pigs" they seem to be pretty lax on the whole, "offensive names" things
